creditline: The Dandelion Endowment Fund for Textiles
markings: label inside lining at one corner, black ink: No. 526; opposite corner, back ink: mi 98/13110 No 788
text: Large, semicircular cape worn by clerics during religious ceremonies. The fabric components consist of a brocaded pink silk with a repeating pattern including flowers, roses, and spiraling lace motifs. Edged with silver metallic braid.
title: Cope
